name: Zen Controllers "Squid Grip" Controller (PS3)
description: Here's the LIMITED EDITION Custom SquidGrip PS3 Controller. (Originally designed by SquidGrip for their 10K followers giveaway) Is features a black shell with Squidgrip blue buttons, thumbsticks, triggers and shoulder buttons and Blue Player LEDs. As well as this; Each controller comes with a free pair of SquidGrips for PS3

name: Zen Controllers "Faded Stripes" Controller (PS3)
description: The Zen Controllers "Faded Stripes" controller is a standard PlayStation controller with a difference to the shell. It features a striped effect that fade into the next stripe and is finished with a matte/semi-gloss finish. It features standard buttons and Red LEDs.

name: Zen Controllers "Scratched Metal" Controller (PS3)
description: The Zen Controllers "Scratched Metal" controller is a standard PlayStation controller with a difference to the shell. It features a scratched look and is finished with a matte/semi-gloss finish. It features standard buttons and Red LEDs.

name: Zen Controllers "Destroyer" Controller (Xbox 360)
description: A brand new "Destroyer" controller. Designed by YouTuber "Nezhh" it features a sleek red and black design with red LEDs and domed PS3 thumbsticks to top off the look. On the reverse of the controller we have added an extra button mapped to 'B' button to help with using your knife on tactical layout whilst playing Call of Duty. Zen Controllers "FPS Triggers" can also be added for use with Call of Duty and other shooting games.
